title: "Snapchat Finally Adds Embeds, Along With Some Lackluster AI"
excerpt: "Snapchat’s new embed feature will allow users to copy the code for their public story, spotlight video or lenses by selecting the embed button under the share options. The feature will automatically copy the code, enabling the user to open it on their computer browser or Snapchat.com site to “link seamlessly to both.”"
